data.persona: I have delicate wings.  I am from a deep and ancient place.  I might be small, but I am far from weak.
data.description:
You are in the Dunes.
A massive hilly landscape that is nothing but sand and a few rocks.  As you walk this area, you can find some human and animal remains along with broken down wood wagons.
The rabid wolf is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to end the wolf's suffering.
data.mid_motivation: I want to use my powers to cure the wolf.
data.long_motivation: I want to spend my life traveling the realm to end the needless suffering of all species.

timeline.label: 4 hours ago
timeline.action: wield the power of enchantment to spellbind the rabid wolf.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: wield the power of healing to quell the wolf's rabies.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: wield the power of suggestion to will the wolf to sleep while it heals.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow the wolf across the dunes to make sure it is truly healed.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: wield the power of telekinesis to properly bury the human and animal remains.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: drink water from a watering hole at the edge of the dunes region.
